name: A Sinking Feeling
description:
Objective: Survive.
Controls: WASD to move, E to interact, Left Shift to run
Please only play the WebGL version if you REFUSE to download the Windows version. The framerate and gameplay experience is considerably better in the Windows version.  It's worth the download size, probably.

Stuff I didn't make myself (plenty):
Water: Aquas Water/River Set
Island: Free Island Collection
Old wooden row boat: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/old-wooden-row-boat-v2-780
Water Bottle by Google: https://poly.google.com/view/0PpSxxQVOxY
Poision bottle by Ryan Donaldson: https://poly.google.com/view/4ibOnYZwYXh
CC-BY Attribution: Gasping sound: https://freesound.org/people/ckvoiceover/sounds/401336/
